content.text: is designed to retrieve and summarize monthly energy usage and cost data for a specified agency or set of agencies. It processes data related to electricity, gas, and steam usage, converting these into costs and energy units (e.g., mmBTUs) for a given billing period. The procedure also logs the usage of the report for auditing purposes and supports hierarchical summarization of data for parent and grandparent agency divisions.

The procedure involves multiple steps, including data retrieval, transformation, and summarization, as well as handling hierarchical data structures. It uses temporary tables and dynamic SQL execution, which adds to its complexity. However, it does not involve highly complex logic or recursive operations, keeping it at a medium complexity level.

CREATE PROCEDURE [Report].[usp_Published_GetMonthlyAgencyData]
(
	@EmailAddress AS VARCHAR(75)
	,@PublishedBillingPeriod AS VARCHAR(6)
	,@AgencyCodeOEC AS VARCHAR(MAX)
	,@IsAgencyUser AS BIT = 0
)
AS
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
	SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

	IF (@IsAgencyUser = 1)
	BEGIN
		SELECT @PublishedBillingPeriod = PublishedBillingPeriod FROM Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame WHERE CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y';
	END;

	DECLARE @spname AS VARCHAR(100) = OBJECT_NAME(@@PROCID);

	EXEC [Audit].usp_AddReportUsageLog
		@ReportName = @spname,
		@StoredProcName = @spname,
		@RequestedBy = @EmailAddress,    
		@prmPublishedBillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod,
		@prmBillingPeriod = NULL,
		@prmAgency_ies = @AgencyCodeOEC,
		@prmFacilityNumber_s = NULL,
		@prmStartingBillingPeriod = NULL,
		@prmEndingBillingPeriod = NULL;

	DECLARE @calendarYear AS VARCHAR(4), @levelIndex AS INT = 3, @mmBTUEleMultiplier AS FLOAT
		,@mmBTUGasMultiplier AS FLOAT, @mmBTUSTMMultiplier AS FLOAT;

	SET @calendarYear = SUBSTRING(@PublishedBillingPeriod, 1, 4);

	DECLARE @BillingPeriod VARCHAR(6)= @PublishedBillingPeriod

    SELECT @mmBTUEleMultiplier = MAX(MMBtusFactor) FROM Factors.ConversionEquivalentsForBtuAndCO2eByBillingPeriod WHERE EnergyDeliveryType = 1 AND BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod;
    SELECT @mmBTUGasMultiplier = MAX(MMBtusFactor) FROM Factors.ConversionEquivalentsForBtuAndCO2eByBillingPeriod WHERE EnergyDeliveryType = 5 AND BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod;
    SELECT @mmBTUSTMMultiplier = MAX(MMBtusFactor) FROM Factors.ConversionEquivalentsForBtuAndCO2eByBillingPeriod WHERE EnergyDeliveryType = 6 AND BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod;
               
	DECLARE @TableReturn TABLE
		(publishedBillingPeriod BillingPeriod,
		BillingPeriod BillingPeriod,
		FiscalYear VARCHAR(4),
		BillingMonth VARCHAR(20),
		AgencyCodeOEC AgencyCodeOEC,
		AgencyName ldesc,
		Cost VARCHAR(30),
		RevisedBilledAmount MONEY, -- general column for both billed amount and usage
		LevelID INT,
		ParentAgencyDivisionID INT,
		CostTypeID INT, -- 1=$, 2=KW, 3=KWH, 4=mmBTU
		IsCostTotal VARCHAR(1)); -- 'N'- not calculated total. Use 'N' to avoid summarize cost twice

	DECLARE @SelectedAgency TABLE
		(agencyLevel INT,
		agencyDivisionSeqId INT,
		ParentAgencyDivisionSeqId INT,
		AgencyDivisionHierarchy HIERARCHYID,
		AgencyCodeOEC AgencyCodeOEC);

	INSERT INTO @SelectedAgency
        (agencyLevel ,
        agencyDivisionSeqId ,
        ParentAgencyDivisionSeqId,
		AgencyDivisionHierarchy,
		AgencyCodeOEC)
	SELECT AgencyDivisionHierarchy.GetLevel()
		,agencyDivisionSeqId
		,ParentAgencyDivisionSeqId
		,AgencyDivisionHierarchy
		,AgencyCodeOEC
	FROM Billing.uftn_TableGetAgencyChildrenByAgencyCodeOEC(@AgencyCodeOEC, @EmailAddress);

	/* dollar amount summary Calculation*/
	INSERT INTO @TableReturn
        (publishedBillingPeriod,
        BillingPeriod,
        FiscalYear,
        BillingMonth,
        AgencyCodeOEC,
        AgencyName,
        Cost,
        RevisedBilledAmount,
        LevelID,
        ParentAgencyDivisionID,
        CostTypeID,
        IsCostTotal)
	SELECT @PublishedBillingPeriod,
        pData.BillingPeriod,
        MAX(pData.FiscalYear),
        MAX(pData.[MonthName]),
        pData.AgencyCodeOEC,
        MAX(pData.AgencyName),
        CASE WHEN pData.Energytype = 'ELE' THEN 'Electricity Cost ($)'
            WHEN pData.Energytype = 'GAS' THEN 'Gas Cost ($)'
            WHEN pData.Energytype = 'STM' THEN 'Steam Cost ($)'
        END Cost,
        SUM(pData.BilledAmount) AS RevisedBilledAmount,
        MAX(A.AgencyLevel),
        MAX(A.ParentAgencyDivisionSeqid),
        1,
        'N'
	FROM Published.TemporalAccountLevelSummaryByAgency AS pData
        INNER JOIN @SelectedAgency AS A ON pData.AgencyCodeOEC = A.AgencyCodeOEC
	WHERE pData.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND pData.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
	GROUP BY pData.BillingPeriod, pData.AgencyCodeOEC,
        CASE WHEN pData.Energytype = 'ELE' THEN 'Electricity Cost ($)'
            WHEN pData.Energytype = 'GAS' THEN 'Gas Cost ($)'
            WHEN pData.Energytype = 'STM' THEN 'Steam Cost ($)'
        END;

	/*KW (electricity deman) summary calculation*/
	INSERT INTO @TableReturn (publishedBillingPeriod
        ,BillingPeriod
        ,FiscalYear
        ,BillingMonth
        ,AgencyCodeOEC
        ,AgencyName
        ,Cost
        ,RevisedBilledAmount
        ,LevelID
        ,ParentAgencyDivisionID
        ,CostTypeID
        ,IsCostTotal)
	SELECT @PublishedBillingPeriod,
        pData.BillingPeriod,
        MAX(pData.FiscalYear),
        MAX(pData.[MonthName]),
        pData.AgencyCodeOEC,
        MAX(pData.AgencyName),
        CASE WHEN Energytype = 'ELE'
            THEN 'Electricity Demand (kW)'
            ELSE '' END AS Demand,
        SUM(pData.DemandUsage) AS AccountDemandUsage,
        MAX(A.AgencyLevel),
        MAX(A.ParentAgencyDivisionSeqid),
        2,
        'N'
	FROM Published.TemporalAccountLevelSummaryByAgency AS pData
        INNER JOIN @SelectedAgency AS A ON pData.AgencyCodeOEC = A.AgencyCodeOEC
  WHERE pData.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod
	AND pData.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod AND pData.EnergyType = 'ELE'
  GROUP BY pData.BillingPeriod, pData.AgencyCodeOEC,
        CASE WHEN pData.Energytype = 'ELE' THEN 'Electricity Demand (kW)'
            ELSE ''
        END;

	/*Electricity Usage (kWh) summary calculation*/
	INSERT INTO @TableReturn
		(publishedBillingPeriod,
		BillingPeriod,
		FiscalYear,
		BillingMonth,
		AgencyCodeOEC,
		AgencyName,
		Cost,
		RevisedBilledAmount,
		LevelID,
		ParentAgencyDivisionID,
		CostTypeID,
		IsCostTotal)
	SELECT @PublishedBillingPeriod,
        pData.BillingPeriod,
        MAX(pData.FiscalYear),
        MAX(pData.[MonthName]),
        pData.AgencyCodeOEC,
        MAX(pData.AgencyName),
        CASE WHEN Energytype = 'ELE' THEN 'Electricity Usage (kWh)'
            WHEN pData.Energytype = 'GAS' THEN 'Gas (Therms)'
            WHEN pData.Energytype = 'STM' THEN 'Steam (MLbs)'
        END AS Usage,
        SUM(pData.EnergyUsage) AS AccountEnergyUsage,
        MAX(A.AgencyLevel),
        MAX(A.ParentAgencyDivisionSeqid),
        3,
        'N'
	FROM Published.TemporalAccountLevelSummaryByAgency AS pData
        INNER JOIN @SelectedAgency AS A ON pData.AgencyCodeOEC = A.AgencyCodeOEC
	WHERE pData.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND pData.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
	GROUP BY pData.BillingPeriod, pData.AgencyCodeOEC,
        CASE WHEN pData.Energytype = 'ELE' THEN 'Electricity Usage (kWh)'
            WHEN pData.Energytype = 'GAS' THEN 'Gas (Therms)'
            WHEN pData.Energytype = 'STM' THEN 'Steam (MLbs)'
        END;

	/* mmBTU summary calculation*/
	INSERT INTO @TableReturn
		(publishedBillingPeriod,
		BillingPeriod,
		FiscalYear,
		BillingMonth,
		AgencyCodeOEC,
		AgencyName,
		Cost,
		RevisedBilledAmount,
		LevelID,
		ParentAgencyDivisionID,
		CostTypeID,
		IsCostTotal)
	SELECT @PublishedBillingPeriod,
		pData.BillingPeriod,
		MAX(pData.FiscalYear),
		MAX(pData.[MonthName]),
		pData.AgencyCodeOEC,
		MAX(pData.AgencyName),
		'Total Usage (mmBTUs)',
		SUM(CASE WHEN pData.Energytype = 'ELE' THEN pData.EnergyUsage * @mmBTUEleMultiplier
			WHEN pData.Energytype = 'GAS' THEN pData.EnergyUsage * @mmBTUGasMultiplier
			WHEN pData.Energytype = 'STM' THEN pData.EnergyUsage * @mmBTUSTMMultiplier
			END) AS AccountEnergyUsage,
		MAX(A.AgencyLevel),
		MAX(A.ParentAgencyDivisionSeqid),
		4,
		'N'
	FROM Published.TemporalAccountLevelSummaryByAgency AS pData
        INNER JOIN @SelectedAgency AS A ON pData.AgencyCodeOEC = A.AgencyCodeOEC
    WHERE pData.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND pData.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
    GROUP BY pData.BillingPeriod, pData.AgencyCodeOEC;
					
	/* Calculate Total*/
	INSERT INTO @TableReturn
		(publishedBillingPeriod,
		BillingPeriod,
		FiscalYear,
		BillingMonth,
		AgencyCodeOEC,
		AgencyName,
		Cost,
		RevisedBilledAmount,
		LevelID,
		ParentAgencyDivisionID,
		CostTypeID,
		IsCostTotal)
	SELECT MAX(publishedBillingPeriod),
		BillingPeriod,
		MAX(FiscalYear),
		MAX(BillingMonth),
		AgencyCodeOEC,
		MAX(AgencyName),
		CASE WHEN CostTypeID = '1' THEN 'Total Cost ($)' END AS Cost,
		SUM(RevisedBilledAmount),
		MAX(LevelID),
		MAX(ParentAgencyDivisionID),
		CostTypeID,
		'Y'
	FROM @TableReturn
	WHERE IsCostTotal = 'N' AND CostTypeID  = '1'
	GROUP BY BillingPeriod, AgencyCodeOEC, CostTypeID;
		
	/* Summarize for parent/grandparent */
	WHILE(@levelIndex > 1)
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO @TableReturn
			(publishedBillingPeriod,
			BillingPeriod,
			FiscalYear,
			BillingMonth,
			AgencyCodeOEC,
			AgencyName,
			Cost,
			RevisedBilledAmount,
			LevelID,
			ParentAgencyDivisionID,
			CostTypeID,
			IsCostTotal)
		SELECT MAX(R.publishedBillingPeriod),
			R.BillingPeriod,
			MAX(R.FiscalYear),
			MAX(R.BillingMonth),
			MAX(ad.AgencyCodeOEC),
			MAX(ad.AgencyName),
			R.Cost,
			SUM(R.RevisedBilledAmount),
			@levelIndex-1,
			MAX(ad.ParentAgencyDivisionSeqid),
			MAX(R.CostTypeID),
			R.IsCostTotal
		FROM @TableReturn AS R
			INNER JOIN Billing.uftn_TableGetAgencyChildrenByAgencyCodeOEC(@AgencyCodeOEC, @EmailAddress) AS ad
				ON R.ParentAgencyDivisionID = ad.AgencyDivisionSeqid
		WHERE R.LevelID = @levelIndex
		GROUP BY R.BillingPeriod, R.ParentAgencyDivisionID, R.BillingPeriod, R.Cost, R.IsCostTotal;
	
		SET @levelIndex = @levelIndex - 1;
	END;

	SELECT MAX(PublishedBillingPeriod) AS PublishedBillingPeriod,
		BillingPeriod,
		MAX(FiscalYear) AS FiscalYear,
		MAX(BillingMonth) AS BillingMonth,
		AgencyCodeOEC,
		MAX(AgencyName) AS AgencyName,
		Cost,
		SUM(RevisedBilledAmount) AS RevisedBilledAmount
	FROM @TableReturn
	GROUP BY BillingPeriod, AgencyCodeOEC, Cost
	ORDER BY AgencyCodeOEC, FiscalYear DESC, billingperiod, Cost ASC;
END;
